page.title: 06St Botolph's (II)
page.content: Not so long ago Mrs.Dawson was asked to lock up the church every evening at about nine o'clock. After a few nights of looking after the church Mrs.Dawson started hearing noises that sounded like footsteps so she began to start taking her dog to the church to lock up and, strangely, her dog began to bark every night at around nine o'clock and every night the footsteps seemed to be getting louder so she asked her friend to come and see if she could hear the footsteps but when her friend came she could not hear anything, so Mrs.Dawson called in a man who dealt with this sort of thing and he said that it was not a ghost it was just a force of habit that could not be stopped.
